articles.title: Live updates: Transgender troops face deadline to voluntarily leave the military
articles.description: As part of Donald Trump's push to uproot DEI efforts, transgender military service members have until Friday to voluntarily leave or face involuntary separation.
articles.content:
A social media account run by recently terminated staffers of the U.S. aid agency that Elon Musk helped destroy had parting words for Musk Friday after his public falling-out with President Donald Trump.
“We’ll see you in the woodchipper,” the group,... [839 chars]

articles.title: NASA Mars Orbiter Spots Volcano Above Morning Clouds
articles.description: Arsia Mons, an ancient Martian volcano, was captured before dawn on May 2, 2025, by NASA's 2001 Mars Odyssey orbiter while the spacecraft was studying
articles.content:
Arsia Mons, an ancient Martian volcano, was captured before dawn on May 2, 2025, by NASA's 2001 Mars Odyssey orbiter while the spacecraft was studying the Red Planet's atmosphere, which appears here as a greenish haze. NASA/JPL-Caltech/ASU
The 2001 O... [4016 chars]

articles.title: NASA Unveils Land Motion Data for North America
articles.description: A new online portal by NASA and the Alaska Satellite Facility maps satellite radar meas-urements across North America, enabling users to track land
articles.content:
A new online portal by NASA and the Alaska Satellite Facility maps satellite radar meas-urements across North America, enabling users to track land movement since 2016 caused by earthquakes, landslides, volcanoes, and other phenomena. USGS
An online ... [7128 chars]

articles.title: Tottenham sack boss Ange Postecoglou despite Europa League win
articles.description: The Australian, who delivered on his promise of "always" winning in his second season, was only the third Spurs boss to taste European success and the first in 17 years to lift silverware.
articles.content:
Tottenham Hotspur have sacked their head coach Ange Postecoglou, despite winning the Europa League 16 days ago.
The team struggled in the Premier League this season and finished in 17th position, one place above the relegation zone.
However, the 1-0 ... [2015 chars]

articles.title: 963 RSP Revealed: Meet Porsche's Street-Legal Le Mans Hypercar
articles.description: Despite niceties like a fully trimmed interior and silver paintwork, the Porsche 963 RSP is an honest road-going race car made for Roger Penske.
articles.content: For years, the difference between road car and race car was a bit more nebulous than it is now. Especially at places like Le Mans, it wasn’t until the 1960s that the paths for road cars and top-flight prototypes started to diverge. Now, the stuff you... [7422 chars]

articles.title: Vietnamese say no to more kids after two-child limit scrapped
articles.description: HANOI, Vietnam - After Vietnam removed its two-child limit, pharmacy worker Nguyen Thi Nguyet Nga says she still has no plans to have more kids, since she barely has time to see her daughters or the money to provide them a good life.
articles.content:
This photograph taken on August 28, 2019 shows a Vietnamese national flag fluttering in the wind outside the Ho Chih Minh mausoleum in Hanoi. Manan Vatsyayana/ AFP

articles.title: Body found in wooded area in search for missing teenager Cole Cooper
articles.description: Cole Cooper, 19, was last seen by a school friend on Wednesday 7 May, in the village of Longcroft near Falkirk, in central Scotland.
articles.content:
A body has been found in the search for a teenager who went missing in early May.
Cole Cooper, 19, was last seen by a school friend on Wednesday 7 May, in the village of Longcroft near Falkirk, in central Scotland.
Mr Cooper was reported missing by h... [2157 chars]

articles.title: In axing mRNA contract, Trump delivers another blow to US biosecurity, former officials say
articles.description: The Trump administration's cancellation of $766 million in contracts to develop mRNA vaccines against potential pandemic flu viruses is the latest blow to national defense, former health security officials said.
articles.content: The Trump administration's cancellation of $766 million in contracts to develop mRNA vaccines against potential pandemic flu viruses is the latest blow to national defense, former health security officials said. They warned that the U.S. could be at ... [9122 chars]

articles.title: Family of missing teenager notified after body discovered in wooded area
articles.description: A man's body was discovered in a wooded area in Banknock on Friday afternoon.
articles.content:
The family of Cole Cooper has been informed after a body was discovered in a wooded area on Friday.
The 19-year-old was reported missing on May 9 and was last seen in the Longcraft area near Falkirk.

articles.title: DHS memo details how National Guard will be used for immigration enforcement : NPR
articles.description: The memo obtained by NPR says troops would be used in activities, including in "night operations and rural interdiction," as well as "guard duty and riot control" inside detention facilities.
articles.content:
DHS memo details how National Guard troops will be used for immigration enforcement
